entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Leaf Rapids
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:07 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023
